display_long_description:
OnBoard Chess brings the classic strategy of chess into an immersive, competitive VR experience. Designed for Oculus Quest, this game lets you sit across from real opponents in beautiful, interactive environments.

🧠 Play Online or Solo – Face real players in multiplayer, test your skills against AI, or connect with millions of players through official Lichess integration.

🌐 Lichess Integration – Log in to your Lichess account to challenge players, join seeks, view your games, and track your rating – all within VR.

🔍 Game History & Analysis – Upgrade to unlock powerful game review tools powered by the Stockfish engine and evaluation bar.

🎨 Custom Boards & Pieces – Personalize your set and table to match your style.

🕰️ Built-In Timer & Ratings – Compete on a global leaderboard with an ELO-based ranking system.

👐 Hand & Controller Support – Move your pieces naturally using either hands or controllers.
